mapper.update: update sys_org set status = #{status, jdbcType=TINYINT}, modifyUser = #{modifyUser, jdbcType=BIGINT}, checkValue = checkValue() WHERE orgId = #{orgId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND checkValue = #{checkValue, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.orgId, b.parentId, b.level FROM sys_user a INNER JOIN sys_org b ON a.orgId = b.orgId WHERE a.userId = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT a.orgId, a.orgNameCN, a.orgNameEN, a.parentId FROM sys_org a WHERE a.orgId = #{orgId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
